item.title: charlie add a quote by Jean Ferris
item.description: "And they lived happily (aside from a few normal disagreements, misunderstandings, pouts, silent treatments, and unexpected calamities) ever after." -- Jean Ferris

item.title: charlie add a quote by Jean Ferris
item.description: "I'm starting to believe that happily ever after includes people doing things that upset each other. We all get cranky, or impatient, or worried, or careless enough to do or say things that hurt someone else. Like it or not, that's normal. We can't blame it all on Olympia's bad energy. The important part is that we feel sorry about what we've done and make up for it. That's something Olympia never did." -- Jean Ferris

item.title: charlie add a quote by Jean Ferris
item.description: "That cup of tea is definately not down your alley" -- Jean Ferris
